resources.string: Select an Artist to see the list of available Albums. Hurdle: load a list of artists from the ones on the device.
Select an existing playlist or create a new one. Hurdle: make the create playlist button working.
Fastpath to recently played songs. Hurdle: let the app memorize last played songs.
Look for Artists. Hurdle: connect to a database of artists on a server.
Current played song. Added a working song, only implemented play button for testing. Hurdle: get metadata of the song
